alert.note: Alert for Flaming Gorge (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 8:52PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sweetwater County through 915 PM MDT... At 851 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Squaw Hollow Boat Ramp On Flaming Gorge, or 21 miles northeast of Manila, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Sweetwater County, including the following locations... Flaming Gorge National Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
